Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Victoria, you'll be centrally located in Victoria, steps from Victoria Conference Centre and minutes from Black Ball Ferry Line. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Victoria Harbour and Victoria Clipper Ferry Terminal.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 181 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11:00:00
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Victoria is Victoria, BC (YYJ-Victoria Intl.) - 24.8 km / 15.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Executive House Hotel is Victoria, BC (YYJ-Victoria Intl.) - 24.7 km / 15.4 mi.
